question.body: Which of the following depends on the proper function of skeletal muscles?

response.feedback: Incorrect. This is one of the actions that depend on the proper functioning of skeletal muscle.
Incorrect. This is one of the actions that depend on the proper functioning of skeletal muscle.
Incorrect. This is one of the actions that depend on the proper functioning of skeletal muscle.
Correct; all of the above rely on the skeletal muscle functioning properly.
